attributes.action: Increase GP consultation time for patients.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Current 10 minutes is not enough for effectively dealing with health problems. 15 minutes should be minimum.
eg. 1 minute to start notifying doctor of reason for visit.
4 minutes to explain symptoms as effectively as possible. 3 minutes for doctor to evaluate symptoms & offer advice & prescription. 2 minutes to close consultation & give consideration to arrival of next patient who is then called to keep appointments running on time!
15 minutes essential for GP consultation!
